name: 5-Minute Baked Yams
description: Yams cooked in just 5 minutes! Yams are a great way to add essential nutrients and fibre to your diet. They’re a low-calorie carb with loads of Vitamins A and C and potassium, which are important for eye health, immunity, and heart health. Use this recipe as a jumping off point: load baked yams with your favourite toppings, like prepared Guacamole, Pulled Pork, Butter Chicken, Philly-Style Cheesesteak filling—there are endless possibilities!

ingredients.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix or Herb & Garlic Dip Mix

preparation: Scrub yams and pierce several times with a fork. Place in Multipurpose Steamer and microwave, covered, for 5–7 min, until easily pierced with a fork.
Slice potato across the top. Top each yam with 1⁄2 tbsp butter and dip mix.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 2 cups leafy greens with 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

summary: Classic notes of chives, parsley, & garlic.
